====Usage notes====
Due to {{w|Han unification}}, this Unicode character appears as {{lang|zh|[[茎]]}} ({{lang|zh|[[艹]][[𢀖]]}}) in PRC-style fonts and {{lang|ja|[[茎]]}} ({{lang|ja|[[艹]][[圣]]}}) in Japan-style fonts. Compare {{lang|zh|[[径]]}} and {{lang|ja|[[径]]}}.
